title: Ithanai Yugamai Lyrics Udhayan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Karthik
Lyrics: Annamalai
Song: Ithanai Yugamai
Music: Manikanth Kadri

Ithanai Yugamai 
Ithanai Yugamai engae irundhai
Ottrai nodyil uyirai thirudi engo maraidhai
Idhayam vellai kagitham, nee adhil ingae oviyam
Eniru kangal sakkram,
Unai mattum suttridum dhinam dhinam
Idhayam vellai kagitham, nee adhil ingae oviyam
Eniru kangal sakkram,
Unai mattum suttridum dhinam dhinam

Ithanai Yugamai Ithanai Yugamai engae irundhai
Ottrai nodyil uyirai thirudi engo maraidhai.. oh oh
Orunal mazhayai orunal veyilai enmel vizhundhai
MOzhi ariyaadha oomai pole mounam sumandhai

kadalin thodakkam mazhai thuliyo..
Kadhal THodakkam Ival vizhiyo..oh oh
Pidikkum nerukkam ival maattume
Kadaisi varayum irukattume .. oh oh

Nee ariyaadha ragasiyamai,
Unnudan endrum irupen
Nee vidum swasa katrinile,
ennuyir kaatrai edupen

Idhayam vellai kagitham, nee adhil ingae oviyam
Eniru kangal sakkram,
Unai mattum suttridum dhinam dhinam

Ithanai Yugamai Ithanai Yugamai engae irundhai
Ottrai nodyil uyirai thirudi engo maraidhai.. 
Orunal mazhayai orunal veyilai enmel vizhundhai
MOzhi ariyaadha oomai pole mounam sumandhai

Thavum kuzhandhai en manamo
Thaayin madiyaai un mugamo
Un kannin asaivil nan parandhen
Kaatrilengo thozhaikindren..oh oh

Unviral pattri nan nadandhu 
Uzhaginai suttrida thondrum
Kanavugal ellam kalaindhalum
NIjamai neethaan vendum

Idhayam vellai kagitham, nee adhil ingae oviyam
Eniru kangal sakkram,
Unai mattum suttridum dhinam dhinam

Ithanai Yugamai Ithanai Yugamai engae irundhai
Ottrai nodyil uyirai thirudi engo maraidhai.. 
Orunal mazhayai orunal veyilai enmel vizhundhai
MOzhi ariyaadha oomai pole mounam sumandhai

seo.description: Get the complete Ithanai Yugamai Lyrics Udhayan Song Lyrics from Udhayan. Read the lyrics penned by Annamalai and composed by Manikanth Kadri and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
